A few lines touching baptism shewing, I. What baptism is, with its signification, II. Who are fit subjects to be baptized, III. The good old way of baptizing, IV. Some objections answered / by Matthew Fenn . Fenn, Matthew.
15 p.
Printed for Matthew Fenn ..., London : 1697.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
